entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
